Reviews.Title: Great for texting and speakerphone sound quality
Reviews.Author: Louisa Filomarino Cauvin
Reviews.Content: If you do a lot of texting that includes numbers (such as prices), this phone has one of those rare 5 row physical keyboards with numbers across the top row so you don't need to press alt.  Another very useful feature for those who have difficulty hearing cell phone conversations is its speakerphone with an additional  virtual button to make the sound even louder--excellent for noisy environments.I also have a Samsung Galaxy Note phablet with a larger screen than the Relay.  Even though I like the phablet's ultra large screen, it does not have a physical 5-row keyboard.  I do a lot of texting with numbers so I probably will switch back to the Relay.  It's nice to have the numbers at hand when entering passwords, dates, and address numbers in addition to prices.My husband and my son were offered a choice between the Relay and the Note.  They both preferred the Relay.  My son preferred it for the 5-row physical keyboard and my hard-of-hearing husband preferred it for the sound quality.

Reviews.Title: my first smartphone
Reviews.Author: follywalker
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.  Since it is my first smartphone it is taking me a little while to get used to it, but it has great features.  Call quality is fabulous and I love the qwerty keyboard.  The camera is also great.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone/Seller
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Great Seller (Breed), Great Phone.Using in Canada with Wind. You get use to the keyboard in the first week, way better than touch typing. Phone arrived brand new sealed only 2 days after purchase from US to Canada (could have been next day after purchase if it weren't for customs). I did have to pay $50 in taxes or something upon arrival though. Great phone!

Reviews.Title: Galaxy S Relay
Reviews.Author: rootytooty
Reviews.Content: I cannot tell you how pleased I am with my new phone.  It is an excellent phone and meets or exceeds my needs.  It is great and I highly recommend this phone to anyone.  As far as the seller goes they are excellent too.  My phone arrived just as advertised and early, ahead of the scheduled delivery date.  I highly recommend the phone and the selling to anyone looking for a good produce and a good seller.
